name: snipe-it
description: Snipe-IT is a self-hosted IT asset management platform for tracking hardware, software, and accessories. It supports barcodes, audit logs, and role-based access via a web UI.
features: Asset tracking: Manages hardware, software licenses, and accessories with detailed records.
Check-in/check-out: Tracks asset assignments to users with history and due dates.
Barcode scanning: Generates and scans barcodes for quick asset identification.
Maintenance tracking: Schedules and logs maintenance activities for equipment.
Depreciation: Calculates asset depreciation using multiple accounting methods.
Audit logs: Records all changes and actions for compliance and accountability.
Custom fields: Adds organization-specific fields to asset records.
Email notifications: Sends alerts for check-outs, due dates, and low inventory.
Reporting tools: Generates reports on assets, users, locations, and activity.
LDAP integration: Syncs users from Active Directory or LDAP servers.
API access: Automates asset management via comprehensive REST API.
Mobile app: Manages assets on the go with iOS and Android applications.
